snippet: The rapper B.o.B., out with “Strange Clouds,” his second album, discusses the wide variety of music he likes, from John Mayer to Coldplay to Gotye.
abstract: Rapper B o B, discusses his wide-ranging musical taste that has influenced his latest album Strange Clouds.
lead_paragraph: The rapper B.o.B., out with “Strange Clouds,” his second album, discusses the wide variety of music he likes, from John Mayer to Coldplay to Gotye.

headline.seo: B.o.B. on the Musicians He Listens to
headline.main: Crossover Realities: The Singers and Styles That Stoke His Sound
headline.print_headline: Crossover Realities: The Singers and Styles That Stoke His Sound
